name: Outerport
headline: Chain-of-memory reasoning for document understanding
description:
Outerport helps AI read documents the way a researcher would - building up understanding section by section and checking facts along the way, instead of just matching similar phrases. For example, when a team needs to confirm a specific requirement in a 200-page compliance policy document, Outerport pinpoints the right section, provides the reasoning, and presents a fact-based summary.

Outerport is built for performance- run thousands of queries against your critical documents, with reasoning behind every retrieval. No more faulty vector RAG.
tags: industry:aiops; industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:infrastructure; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Towaki Takikawa, Co-Founder / CEO
founders.description: Ex-Research Scientist at NVIDIA Research, worked on generative AI, compression, hyperscale graphics systems, and neural graphics. Enjoys high-performance systems, CUDA programming, and operations (automation and integration).

founders.name: Allen Wang, Co-founder / CTO
founders.description: I previously worked at Tome (LLM for sales), Embark (self-driving), Vector Institute (ML research), Facebook (ads), and LinkedIn (infra). CS and math alum from UWaterloo.

raw_markdown='[![Outerport Logo](https://outerport.com/outerport.svg)](https://outerport.com/</>)
[Engine](https://outerport.com/</engine>)[Blog](https://outerport.com/</blog>)[About Us](https://outerport.com/</aboutus>)Request Access
Backed by [Y Combinator](https://outerport.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/outerport>), built by [AI scientists from NVIDIA & Meta](https://outerport.com/</aboutus>)
# Understand yourcomplex documents faster,with chain-of-memory reasoning
Run thousands of queries against your critical documents, with reasoning behind every retrieval. No more faulty vector RAG.
Request Access
Q&AComplianceResearch
"Vector search breaks for vague questions and complex documents, like compliance policies. Failure to retrieve the needed context leads to hallucination. Relevance needs to be more than just similarity."
- VPoE at Financial Services Firm
## Why reasoning-based retrieval?
### Beyond Vector Similarity
Vector databases force you to think in terms of nearest neighbors, making complex queries difficult or impossible to express.
Example: "Flag sections that violate compliance guidelines" can't be expressed as vector similarity.
### 10-20x More Efficient
Our intelligent processing makes long context reasoning dramatically more resource efficient than traditional approaches, without sacrificing quality.
Get the same powerful reasoning capabilities at a fraction of the usual cost through optimized memory management. Powered by our [Engine](https://outerport.com/</engine>).
### Smart Document Processing
Unlike basic Q&A systems, our chain-of-memory approach builds understanding progressively, perfect for complex documents where context matters.
Automatically build comprehensive knowledge bases from your documents, no pre-existing Q&A required.
### Unlimited Document Length
Process documents of any size while maintaining consistent high quality, unlike traditional LLMs that degrade with length.
From short emails to thousand-page documents, get reliable insights without quality loss.
## How it works
1
### Smart Reading
Like a careful reader, our AI breaks down your document into natural sections, understanding how different parts connect and flow together.
2
### Chain-of-Memory
As it reads, our system builds a chain of memories, remembering important details and making connections across the entire document, just like a human would.
3
### Fact Checking
Every insight is double-checked against your original document, ensuring our AI only provides information that's actually present in your text.
4
### Understanding
This verified memory chain helps our AI understand your entire document as one complete story, making it possible to answer questions that require deep comprehension.
## Get accessimmediately.
Trusted by financial services and leading research institutions. Built by a team that built AI and GPU systems at NVIDIA, Meta, LinkedIn.
Contact us at: info@outerport.com

generated_description:
**Outerport: Unlocking Document Understanding with AI**

Founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Outerport is a cutting-edge startup located in San Francisco with a mission to revolutionize how AI comprehends documents. Their innovative technology employs a unique "chain-of-memory reasoning" approach that empowers AI to read and interpret complex documents like a human researcher would—section by section—while checking facts along the way.

Imagine needing to sift through a hefty 200-page compliance document. Traditional AI models often struggle with vague queries or complex structures, typically relying on vector similarity that doesn't quite grasp the intricacies of context. This is where Outerport shines. Their system not only identifies the relevant sections but also provides fact-based summaries and reasoning behind every retrieval, eliminating the fear of unreliable outputs often associated with AI’s tendency to “hallucinate” facts.

At its core, Outerport is built for performance. With capabilities that allow running thousands of queries on your documents without compromising quality, this tool is robust enough to handle unlimited document lengths—from a simple email to a dense policy manual—while maintaining clarity and context. The key to their process is smart reading, where their AI breaks down text into natural sections and builds a verified memory chain. This means it remembers critical details as it parses content, just as a human would, leading to a more comprehensive understanding of the material.

Backed by a team of AI scientists from major tech companies like NVIDIA and Meta, Outerport aims to outpace traditional document processing systems by being 10x to 20x more efficient. Their intelligent processing redefines resource management, ensuring users get profound insights without the usual pitfalls of long context deterioration seen in many large language models.

Whether it's for compliance, research, or general document inquiry, Outerport gives organizations the robust tools they need to make sense of their extensive documentation intelligently. For financial services firms and research institutions looking to streamline their document comprehension process, Outerport is a game changer.

To learn more about Outerport and how it can transform your document handling experience, visit their website at [Outerport.com](https://outerport.com) or reach out directly via email at info@outerport.com. Welcome to the next generation of document understanding.
